document_data.caption: Kornah "the Crazy"
document_data.name: Kornah
document_data.title: the crazy
document_data.mainbody: '''Kornah "The Crazy"''' was a member of the [[Harpers]] who posed as a crazed guide of [[Zhentil Keep]]. She had a pet [[crow]] named ''Shalla'' with whom Kornah shared a weak mental-link.
document_data.Home: Kornah's house, in keeping with her disguise, is a disheveled mess. This is all for appearances, though, as it in actuality serves as a safehouse for any Harpers in the region.
